typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'https://bigrpdiag.blob.core.windows.net/geodata/output/Doc/Code-Point_Open_Column_Headers.csv',
	wildcardPaths:['output/Data/CSV/']) ~> GeoData
GeoData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
